title: Microsoft Fixes 90 New Flaws, Including Actively Exploited NTLM and Task Scheduler Bugs
description: Microsoft on Tuesday revealed that two security flaws impacting Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) and Task Scheduler have come under active exploitation in the wild. The security vulnerabilities are among the 90 security bugs the tech giant addressed as part of its Patch Tuesday update for November 2024.
